content:
14839 - Search by Specialty (Ex: Orthopedic, Pediatrician etc) can be introduced - 2018-Jan Core #179

Specialty is a property of PracitionerRole, not Practitioner, so I'm suggest this be non-persuasive via a block vote.
so if you want to find the practitioners with a given specialty, you have to search the practitioner role and ask for also the practioner info in the search results?
